Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbals! As you may know, the Jebi and the Kith have recently broken out in war. There have been multiple shows of superweapons including the one I'm showing you today. Of course this is a miniature version, but it does work! With over 500 parts, it won't even lag your komputer. This replica includes opening ion cannons that have knocko- I mean realistic ion drives inside. This ship is powered by many RTGs and a small probe. It has a very nice acceleration, at about .2 m/s!

Sorry for no pictures yet, haven't gotten around to doing that. My computer is being a potato

DL: http://www./view/8jthkw8tn6f414j/Malevolence%20Replica.craft

Will post pictures later when my computer isn't a potato.
